verses.verse: In the third <S%H7969><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of the reign <S%H4438><s%> of king <S%H4428><s%> Belshazzar <S%H1112><s%> a vision <S%H2377><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto me <S%H1840><s%>, even unto me, Daniel, after <S%H310><s%> that which appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto me at the first <S%H8462><s%>.

And I saw <S%H7200><s%> in the vision <S%H2377><s%>; now it was so <S%H7200><s%>, that when I saw, I was in Shushan <S%H7800><s%> the palace <S%H1002><s%>, which is in the province <S%H4082><s%> of Elam <S%H5867><s%>; and I saw <S%H7200><s%> in the vision <S%H2377><s%>, and I was by the river <S%H180><s%> Ulai <S%H195><s%>.

Then I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and saw <S%H7200><s%>, and <S%H5975><s%>, behold, there stood before <S%H6440><s%> the river <S%H180><s%> a <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%> which had two horns <S%H7161><s%>: and the two horns <S%H7161><s%> were high <S%H1364><s%>; but one <S%H259><s%> was higher <S%H1364><s%> than the other <S%H8145><s%>, and the higher <S%H1364><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> last <S%H314><s%>.

I saw <S%H7200><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> pushing <S%H5055><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>, and northward <S%H6828><s%>, and southward <S%H5045><s%>; and no beasts <S%H2416><s%> could stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H5337><s%>, neither was there any that could deliver out of his hand <S%H3027><s%>; but he did <S%H6213><s%> according to his will <S%H7522><s%>, and magnified himself <S%H1431><s%>.

And as I was considering <S%H995><s%>, behold <S%H5795><s%>, a he - goat <S%H6842><s%> came <S%H935><s%> from the west <S%H4628><s%> over the face <S%H6440><s%> of the whole earth <S%H776><s%>, and touched <S%H5060><s%> not the ground <S%H776><s%>: and the goat <S%H6842><s%> had a notable <S%H2380><s%> horn <S%H7161><s%> between his eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

And he came <S%H935><s%> to the ram <S%H352><s%> that had <S%H1167><s%> the two horns <S%H7161><s%>, which I saw <S%H7200><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the river <S%H180><s%>, and ran <S%H7323><s%> upon him in the fury <S%H2534><s%> of his power <S%H3581><s%>.

And I saw <S%H7200><s%> him come <S%H5060><s%> close unto <S%H681><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%>, and he was moved with anger <S%H4843><s%> against him <S%H5221><s%>, and smote the ram <S%H352><s%>, and brake <S%H7665><s%> his two <S%H8147><s%> horns <S%H7161><s%>; and there was no power <S%H3581><s%> in the ram <S%H352><s%> to stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H7993><s%>; but he cast him down to the ground <S%H776><s%>, and trampled <S%H7429><s%> upon him <S%H5337><s%>; and there was none that could deliver the ram <S%H352><s%> out of his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And the he <S%H6842><s%> - goat <S%H5795><s%> magnified <S%H1431><s%> himself exceedingly <S%H3966><s%>: and when he <S%H6842><s%> was strong <S%H6105><s%>, the great <S%H1419><s%> horn <S%H7161><s%> was broken <S%H7665><s%>; and instead of it there came up <S%H5927><s%> four <S%H702><s%> notable horns toward the four <S%H702><s%> winds <S%H7307><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>.

And out of one <S%H259><s%> of them came forth <S%H3318><s%> a little <S%H4704><s%> horn <S%H7161><s%>, which waxed exceeding <S%H3499><s%> great <S%H1431><s%>, toward the south <S%H5045><s%>, and toward the east <S%H4217><s%>, and toward the glorious land <S%H6643><s%>.

And it waxed great <S%H1431><s%>, even to the host <S%H6635><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>; and some of the host <S%H6635><s%> and of the stars <S%H3556><s%> it cast down <S%H5307><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>, and trampled upon them <S%H7429><s%>.

Yea <S%H1431><s%>, it magnified itself <S%H8269><s%>, even to the prince of the host <S%H6635><s%>; and it took away <S%H7311><s%> from him the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H4349><s%>, and the place of his sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> was cast down <S%H7993><s%>.

And the host <S%H6635><s%> was given <S%H5414><s%> over to it together with the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H6588><s%> through transgression; and it cast down <S%H7993><s%> truth <S%H571><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>, and it did its pleasure <S%H6213><s%> and prospered <S%H6743><s%>.

Then I heard <S%H8085><s%> a <S%H259><s%> holy one <S%H6918><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%>; and another <S%H259><s%> holy one <S%H259><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto that certain <S%H6422><s%> one who spake <S%H1696><s%>, How long shall be the vision <S%H2377><s%> concerning the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt-offering <S%H6588><s%>, and the transgression that maketh desolate <S%H8074><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> both the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> and the host <S%H6635><s%> to be trodden under foot <S%H4823><s%>?

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H505><s%>, Unto two thousand and three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> evenings <S%H6153><s%> and mornings <S%H6944><s%>; then shall the sanctuary be cleansed <S%H6663><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H1840><s%>, when I, even I Daniel, had seen <S%H7200><s%> the vision <S%H2377><s%>, that I sought <S%H1245><s%> to understand <S%H998><s%> it <S%H5975><s%>; and, behold, there stood before me as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of a man <S%H1397><s%>.

And I heard <S%H8085><s%> a man <S%H120><s%>'s voice <S%H6963><s%> between the banks of the Ulai <S%H195><s%>, which called <S%H7121><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Gabriel <S%H1403><s%>, make this <S%H1975><s%> man to understand <S%H995><s%> the vision <S%H4758><s%>.

So he came <S%H935><s%> near <S%H681><s%> where I stood <S%H5977><s%>; and when he came <S%H935><s%>, I was affrighted <S%H1204><s%>, and fell <S%H5307><s%> upon my face <S%H6440><s%>: but he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H995><s%>, Understand, O son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>; for the vision <S%H2377><s%> belongeth to the time <S%H6256><s%> of the end <S%H7093><s%>.

Now as he was speaking <S%H1696><s%> with me <S%H7290><s%>, I fell into a deep sleep with my face <S%H6440><s%> toward the ground <S%H776><s%>; but he touched <S%H5060><s%> me <S%H5975><s%>, and set me upright <S%H5977><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H3045><s%>, I will make thee know what shall be in the latter time <S%H319><s%> of the indignation <S%H2195><s%>; for it belongeth to the appointed <S%H4150><s%> time of the end <S%H7093><s%>.
The ram <S%H352><s%> which thou sawest <S%H7200><s%>, that had <S%H1167><s%> the two horns <S%H7161><s%>, they are the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Media <S%H4074><s%> and Persia <S%H6539><s%>.

And the rough <S%H8163><s%> he <S%H6842><s%> - goat is the king <S%H4428><s%> of Greece <S%H3120><s%>: and the great <S%H1419><s%> horn <S%H7161><s%> that is between his eyes <S%H5869><s%> is the first <S%H7223><s%> king <S%H4428><s%>.

And as for that which was broken <S%H7665><s%>, in the place whereof four <S%H702><s%> stood up <S%H5975><s%>, four <S%H702><s%> kingdoms <S%H4438><s%> shall stand up <S%H5975><s%> out of the nation <S%H1471><s%>, but not with his power <S%H3581><s%>.

And in the latter time <S%H319><s%> of their kingdom <S%H4438><s%>, when the transgressors <S%H6586><s%> are come to the full <S%H8552><s%>, a king <S%H4428><s%> of fierce <S%H5794><s%> countenance <S%H6440><s%>, and understanding <S%H995><s%> dark sentences <S%H2420><s%>, shall stand up <S%H5975><s%>.

And his power <S%H3581><s%> shall be mighty <S%H6105><s%>, but not by his own power <S%H3581><s%>; and he shall destroy <S%H7843><s%> wonderfully <S%H6381><s%>, and shall prosper <S%H6743><s%> and do his pleasure <S%H6213><s%>; and he shall destroy <S%H7843><s%> the mighty <S%H6099><s%> ones and the holy <S%H6918><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>.

And through his policy <S%H7922><s%> he shall cause craft <S%H4820><s%> to prosper <S%H6743><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>; and he shall magnify <S%H1431><s%> himself in his heart <S%H3824><s%>, and in their security <S%H7962><s%> shall he destroy <S%H7843><s%> many <S%H7227><s%>: he shall also stand up <S%H5975><s%> against the prince <S%H8269><s%> of princes <S%H8269><s%>; but he shall be broken <S%H7665><s%> without <S%H657><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And the vision <S%H4758><s%> of the evenings <S%H6153><s%> and mornings <S%H1242><s%> which hath been told <S%H559><s%> is true <S%H571><s%>: but shut thou up <S%H5640><s%> the vision <S%H2377><s%>; for it belongeth to many <S%H7227><s%> days to come <S%H3117><s%>.

And I <S%H1840><s%>, Daniel, fainted <S%H1961><s%>, and was sick <S%H2470><s%> certain days <S%H3117><s%>; then I rose up <S%H6965><s%>, and did <S%H6213><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%>'s business <S%H4399><s%>: and I wondered <S%H8074><s%> at the vision <S%H4758><s%>, but none understood it <S%H995><s%>.
